description_en: Grants protection against the effects of poison.
Reduces the duration of paralysis.
Reduces the duration of sleep.
Reduces stun duration.
Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck.
Grants protection against blastblight.
Grants protection against bleeding.
Grants protection against Defense Down.
Grants protection from large monsters' roars.
Grants protection against wind pressure.
Grants protection against ground tremors.
Makes monsters hit with slinger dung pods more likely to run.
Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.
Nullifies damage from heat.
Increases attack power. Also improves affinity at higher levels.
Increases defense. Level up to improve resistances as well.
Increases health.
Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.
Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).
Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Increases the rate of blast buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Increases the attack power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

name_ja: 貫通弾・竜の一矢強化
description_en: Increases the attack power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.
Increases the attack power of spread ammo and power shot arrows.
Unlocks your weapon's hidden element. Also increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)
Increases affinity.
Increases the damage of critical hits.
Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.
Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.
Allows long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades to stay powered up longer.
Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.
Increases affinity when performing draw attacks.
Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters.
Makes it easier to stun monsters.
Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.
Makes it easier to mount monsters.
Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.
Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.
Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.
Increases attack when your health is full.
Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.
Increases your attack and defense every time you fall in battle. (This effect can stack twice.)
Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).
Improves evasion and reduces stamina depletion when afflicted with abnormal status effects.
Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.
Increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.
Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.
Strengthens explosive attacks like gunlance shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and sticky ammo.
Increases the firepower of ballistae and cannons.
Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).
Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, etc.
Alows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.
Speeds up stamina recovery.
Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.
Extends the invulnerability period when evading.
Increases evade distance.
Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.
Speeds up weapon sheating.
Sllows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.
Extends the duration of some item effects.
Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.
Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.
Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.
Increases the damage of explosive items.
Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.
Improves your skill at fishing.
Increases your speed while transporting items and decreases the likelihood of dropping them,
Allows you to gather more quickly, and also prevents attacks from knocking you back while gathering.
Increases the quantity of honey you receive when gathering in the field.
Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.
Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.
Powers up Palicoes.
Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.
Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.
Increases affinity when stamina is full.
Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo obtained in the field.
Makes it easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.
Expands your scoutflies' detection range.
Increases movement speed while crouching.
Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.
Recover health when using sporepuffs.
Improves mobility in water.
Decreases stamina depletion when evading while clinging to walls or ivy.
Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.
Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations. (Effect is applied at the quest results screen.)
Decreases the chances of destroying the bodies of small insect monsters, allowing them to be carved.
Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.
Increases your scoutflies' gauge fill rate when you find tracks and other traces left by monsters.
Increases the chance of finding rare gathering points.
Shows rare gathering points on the Wildlife Map.
Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.
Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.
Reduces the chances small monsters will attack after spotting you. (No effect on certain monsters.)
Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.
Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.
Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.
Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.
Increases stamina cap.
Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.
Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.
Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boosts ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.
Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.
High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.
Above a certain health threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).
Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.
Negates all wind pressure.
Halves sharpness loss. For bows and bowguns, shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.
Increases abnormal status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.
High chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
Increases max bow charge level by one.
Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power.
Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.
Improves your skill at cooking meat.
Allows you to apply blast coatings.
Grants protection against all elemental blights.
Increases the Elderseal of weapons and dragon ammo.
Allows you to apply paralysis coatings.
Allows you to apply poison coatings.
Allows you to apply sleep coatings.
